name: UI - Design System - Sunrise
description:
☀️Sunrise is a Design System oriented for Web (Desktop & Mobile) usage I created. I kept things fairly simple as I believe it should have space to organically grow your component library specifically for your application.


I decided to make ☀️Sunrise, open source and available to anyone who would like to use it or be inspired by it.


Special thanks to Anja van Staden, for the use of her Teeny Icons set as well as her Ambient Overlays.
